oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Tetrasodium EDTA: a non-antibiotic antimicrobial lock solution effective against clinically relevant microorganisms from Central Venous Access Devices of Canadian patients
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Lainesse, Chantal
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: alternative to antibiotics
biofilm
tetrasodium EDTA
antimicrobial stewardship
superbugs
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: To test the efficacy of a non-antibiotic antimicrobial catheter lock solution containing 4% tetrasodium EDTA (T-EDTA) to eradicate clinically relevant microbes colonising CVADs of (human) patients.
